DPTabletopMiniatureBases_ModName.Text: Tabletop Miniature Bases For Inventory Screen

DPTabletopMiniatureBases_ModDesc.Text: Replaces the flat holographic disc in the inventory and character creation screens with a classic tabletop-style miniature base.

DPTabletopMiniatureBases_DropdownDescLon.Text: Choose your preferred style of base. Note that the same base is shared between all characters.
